lead_paragraph: CHESTLER--Rita. It is with deep sorrow that the Officers, Board of Governors, members and staff of Fresh Meadow Country Club mourn the loss of our esteemed member, Rita Chestler. The Chestlers have been members of Fresh Meadow for 38 years. We extend our heartfelt sympathy to her husband, Herbert, her children, Steven, Danny and Cathy, her grandchildren and her entire family. Lee D. Charles, President Howard Hershenhorn, Secretary 1/3
